name: Great Escape
description:
Great Escape is a brand new platformer with cartoonistic graphics and new features.

4 DIFFERENT SKILLS
- Time Command: Time is your slave! The wheel of time is in your mighty hands now, use it wisely...

- Spirit: Like a whisper in the night, you will be seen no more. During your visit to the spirit world, your enemies will ignore your presence.

- Mega Jump: Your courage will make you lighter and gravity will be nice to you.

- Magnet: Your extraordinary mind will attract treasures to your powerful body like a magnet. Your mighty head will be crowned with magical gold.

3 DIFFERENT VEHICLES
Dozer: The powerful spikey war machine
Dragon Bike: The mighty breath of your dragon
Shark Plane: The flying wondrous shark plane

3 DIFFERENT WEAPONS & MORE...
publishers: Panteon Yazilim Oyun Egitim Teknolojileri ve Hizmetleri San. Tic. Ltd. Sirketi
